item.description:
Movie and dinner – do movie or both.  Friday evening Dec 28th we will be seeing The Hobbit in IMAX 3D at Jordan’s Furniture in Natick at 6:30.  The movie run-time is 2hrs 46 minutes but with previews expect about 3 hours.  After the movie those who want to can join for a bite to eat.  We will select a restaurant based upon group choice from British Beer Works, TGI Fridays, Joe’s American Bar & Grill, and Kelly’s Roast Beef.RSVP so we can get an accurate headcount. Tickets appear to be $14.25 - $11.50 for the ticket and a $2.75 fee that includes the 3D glasses.


We are shooting for a group of ten or more. If you haven't experienced IMAX 3D you will be in for a real treat!

No Meetup fee on this event.
item.how_to_find_us: We will text you instructions - be sure to send your cell # when you sign up. We will NOT be saving these numbers.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Movie and dinner - The Hobbit in IMAX 3D
